creator: Elizabeth W. Grierson
description:
LibriVox recording of Tales of English Minsters: Hereford by Elizabeth W. Grierson.
Read in English by David Wales

This short book was originally written for children, though adults will also find it worthwhile. It tells interesting history of Hereford in western England, its cathedral, and its people. - Summary by david wales

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;history; church history; hereford england; cathedral
title: Tales of English Minsters: Hereford
